articles.title: True Colours Of Uranus And Neptune Challenge Previous Assumptions - NDTV
articles.description: In a recent study, scientists used data from the Hubble Space Telescope and the European Southern Observatory's Very Large Telescope to reveal the true colours of the two ice planets.
articles.content:
The new findings stem from reevaluation of images taken during a space mission in the 1980s
New Delhi: A recent study led by UK astronomers has challenged our longstanding perceptions of the colours… [+2747 chars]
